Author: littlemissbones
Text: Gas x, a heating pad, and water.  I look like 6 months pregnant right now not even joking, fuck bloating

Author: fawnseer
Text: Dude, I'm also dealing. I tackle the bloat with digestive enzymes, herbal teas (belly comfort and smooth moves from traditional medicinals are my faves), yoga and deep breathing. Also doing whatever else distracts you from the discomfort lol
